languages.text: "Ты совершила великое, сестра. Если кто и достоин ощутить светлый покой, то это ты".
languages.translation_comment:
Completed Argenta's second quest.
Argenta: "The mystery of my patroness's final resting place has been solved. I feel... at peace. What an amazing, radiant feeling."

languages.text: "You have accomplished something great indeed, Sister. If anyone deserves to feel at peace, it is you."
languages.translation_comment:
Completed Argenta's second quest.
Argenta: "The mystery of my patroness's final resting place has been solved. I feel... at peace. What an amazing, radiant feeling."
languages.original_text: "Ты совершила великое, сестра. Если кто и достоин ощутить светлый покой, то это ты".

languages.text: 「シスターは実に偉大なことを成し遂げた。あなたはまさに心安らかでいるに値する」
languages.original_text: "You have accomplished something great indeed, Sister. If anyone deserves to feel at peace, it is you."

traits.locale_text: 「シスターは実に偉大なことを成し遂げた。あなたはまさに心安らかでいるに値する」

languages.text: "Ihr habt in der Tat etwas Großes erreicht, Schwester. Wenn jemand inneren Frieden verdient hat, dann Ihr."
languages.original_text: "You have accomplished something great indeed, Sister. If anyone deserves to feel at peace, it is you."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt in der Tat etwas Großes erreicht, Schwester. Wenn jemand inneren Frieden verdient hat, dann Ihr."

languages.text: «Ha conseguido algo verdaderamente grandioso, hermana. Si alguien merece algo de paz, es usted».
languages.original_text: "You have accomplished something great indeed, Sister. If anyone deserves to feel at peace, it is you."

traits.locale_text: «Ha conseguido algo verdaderamente grandioso, hermana. Si alguien merece algo de paz, es usted».

languages.text: “你确实完成了伟大的壮举，修女。如果有谁有权感到安宁，那这个人就是你。”
languages.original_text: "You have accomplished something great indeed, Sister. If anyone deserves to feel at peace, it is you."

traits.locale_text: “你确实完成了伟大的壮举，修女。如果有谁有权感到安宁，那这个人就是你。”

languages.text: Gerçekten de büyük bir şey başardın Rahibe. Huzur bulmayı hak eden biri varsa o da sensin."

languages.text: « Ce que vous avez accompli est tout à votre honneur, ma sœur. Si quelqu'un mérite de trouver la paix, c'est bien vous. »
